title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish of sautéed beef served in a sauce with sour cream.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables sautéed in a flavorful sauce.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Garlic butter shrimp served over a bed of linguine pasta.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
